name: Omega 3
short_description: According to a long line of studies, it was proven that Omega 3s help lower the risk of heart failure. For years already, this disease has been known to be top killer in the United States. Actually, a number of people have made a claim that this [http://allamericanomega3.com Omega 3 Fish Oil] protects against symptoms of depression, dementia, cancer, arthritis,and many other diseases. Ordinarily [http://omega3s.net Omega 3s] are found in salmon, nuts, leafy greens, and more — but the health benefits can differ greatly from one source to another.
